title: Traveling at the End of the World: A Tour of Canada’s Gaspé Peninsula
description: The St. Lawrence River was once a North American superhighway. Today, following its path takes you along a coastline best described as otherworldly.
dc:creator: Richard Rubin
media:credit: Nasuna Stuart-Ulin for The New York Times
media:description: Sandpipers dart across the water along the banks of the St. Lawrence River at dusk.
